recipe.title: Lemony Crab Salad with Baby Greens
instructions: In large nonmetallic bowl,toss first 4 ingredients to combine. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Toss greens with 1/4 cup olive oil in large bowl; season to taste with salt. Divide among 4 plates. Mound crab on greens and serve.
